4 using UnityEngine;
5 using UnityEditor;
6 
7 using System;
8 using System.Reflection;
9 
10 namespace FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.Internal {
11 
15  internal static class RotorzGUIHelper {
16 
17  static RotorzGUIHelper() {
18  var tyGUIClip = typeof(GUI).Assembly.GetType("UnityEngine.GUIClip");
19  if (tyGUIClip != null) {
20  var piVisibleRect = tyGUIClip.GetProperty("visibleRect", BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public);
21  if (piVisibleRect != null) {
22  var getGetMethod = piVisibleRect.GetGetMethod();
23  VisibleRect = () => (Rect)getGetMethod.Invoke(null, null);
24  }
25  }
26 
27  var miFocusTextInControl = typeof(EditorGUI).GetMethod("FocusTextInControl", BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public);
28  if (miFocusTextInControl == null)
29  miFocusTextInControl = typeof(GUI).GetMethod("FocusControl", BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public);
30 
31  FocusTextInControl = str => miFocusTextInControl.Invoke(null, new object[] { str });
32  }
33 
40  public static Func<Rect> VisibleRect;
41 
45  public static Action<string> FocusTextInControl;
46 
47  }
48 
49 }
